doc.field: A hidden gem of a restaurant tucked inside the Tin Palace in Half Moon Bay. It's the coastside's only sushi choice...
Japanese specialties, including fresh nigiri, sashimi, sukiyaki, teriyaki, tempura and sushi rolls, served in a...
While one should normally be suspicious of supercheap sushi, this beloved little spot down the coast is somehow...
Traditional rolls at reasonable prices make this Half Moon Bay sushi spot popular with locals.
